name: Echoes Of The Past (0KamiQ0)
description:
Basic Info

Echoes Of The Past is a horror game in which you are a Paranormal investigator and you're trying to understand the story behind a lonely old mansion in the woods.

Next Update

The next update is being released soon, probably 17/01/2023, but I'm not sure yet, however, I hope you enjoy this prototype and help me develop this game.
